message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to offer you the chance to own this item at a special price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to provide you with a unique opportunity to secure this valuable asset while also ensuring a fair return for my investment. I believe this price strikes a balance between the intrinsic worth of the product to you and its market value, making it an attractive proposition for both parties involved. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you decide to proceed with the purchase.
